name: Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences
memberOrga: IVA is a swedish royal national academy with approximately 1300 distinguished national and international fellows from the academic, industrial and public sectors.
goal: To promote technical and economic sciences, and the development of enterprises, for the benefit of society.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
1) Research and innovation framework programs (Horizon 2020, FP9).

2) Initiatives relating to energy, sustainability and education.
